title: Greatclub +1
content:
Greatclub +1 Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Without the wrapped leather grip, the weight of the slab of iron at the end of this greatclub would send it flying with a single swing.
